home.title: Next.js Supabase Starter
home.subtitle: A complete authentication system with login, logout, and protected routes powered by Supabase and Next.js

authStatus.notLoggedIn: You are not currently logged in
authStatus.hasAccess: You have access to protected content
authStatus.signInToAccess: Sign in to access protected content

secureAuth.title: Secure Authentication
secureAuth.description: Powered by Supabase Auth with email/password authentication and secure session management.

protectedRoutes.title: Protected Routes
protectedRoutes.description: Server-side route protection that automatically redirects unauthenticated users to login.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: Complete user signup, login, logout, and password reset functionality.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Your Password
forgotPassword.description: Type in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailDescription: If you registered using your email and password, you will receive a password reset email.

protected.title: Welcome to your dashboard!
protected.description: You are successfully logged in and can access protected content.
protected.protectedInfo: This is a protected page that you can only see as an authenticated user

todoApp.title: Local-First Todo App
todoApp.description: Experience real-time synchronization with Legend-State and Supabase. Work offline and sync seamlessly when back online.
